participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

subjectkey.Description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

src_subject_id.Description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

interview_date.Description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

interview_age.Description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging. | Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

sex.Description: Sex of subject at birth | M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

eventname.Description: The event name for which the data was collected

gdt_scr_event.Description: Event selected by RA if not 2-year follow-up (HIDEFROMCOMPLETION)

gdt_scr_script_elapsedtime.Description:
script.elapsedtime:

Time it took to run script (in ms)

gdt_scr_values_account_balance.Description:
values.account_balance:

Amount participant owns at the end

gdt_scr_values_single.Description:
values.single:

Counts how many times participant has bet on 1 specific dice face

gdt_scr_values_double.Description:
values.double:

Counts how many times participant has bet on 2 specific dice face

gdt_scr_values_triple.Description:
values.triple:

Counts how many times participant has bet on 3 specific dice face

gdt_scr_values_quadruple.Description:
values.quadruple:

Counts how many times participant has bet on 4 possible dice faces

gdt_scr_values_safe.Description:
values.safe:

Counts how many times participants selected a safe bet (bets on 3 or 4 dice faces)

gdt_scr_values_risky.Description:
values.risky:

Counts how many times participants selected a risky bet (bets on 1 or 2 dice faces)

gdt_scr_expressions_net_score.Description:
expressions.net_score:

Reflects the number of safe (bets on 3 or 4 numbers) vs. risky (bets on 1 or 2 numbers) choices. It is computed as number of safe bets minus number of risky bets.

gdt_scr_values_wins.Description:
values.wins:

Adds the number of winning bets

gdt_scr_values_losses.Description:
values.losses:

Adds the number of losing bets
